subject: Action Required: Data Product Generation Failed Due to Quarantined Records

body.content:
Dear Reserving team,

We regret to inform you that the Claims Triangle Input generation process has failed due to the total dollar value of quarantined records exceeding the $100,000 threshold.

Details:

  • Time of Run: {uploadedTime}
  • Location of quarantined records: {tableName}

Please review the quarantined records at the specified workspace location, address the data issues in IIS, and rerun the pipeline to generate the data product.
